column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came in to this popular restaurant on New Years Day
column2: and was seated in less than 20 minutes. Service was great
column3: but food did not live up to the hype. Food was served warm to cold
column4: and the taste did not jump out as a great pizza. Buffalo wings were salty and calamari was soggy
column5: not crispy. If you have to try it
column7: but be prepared to bring your jacket on a cold day (even when you're seated) and hope you don't come on an off day for the place (despite the service being 5-star quality).
